attributes.action:

attributes.background: I have had any amount of difficulty with web sites that will not progress unless I give them a genuine mobile telephone number. I wish to remain ex-directory or, the unacceptable, not to own a mobile phone if I choose not to do.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This would be the responsibility of the website owners.
